title: BF-Fi
author: BF-Fi
created_time: July 13, 2022, 03:33:18 AMLast edit: July 23, 2022, 04:24:17 AM by BF-Fi
content: Changeangel is non-custodial exchangeA quick and safe non-custodial way to buy and sell over 100 coinsHOW IT WORKS?Here are the 3 steps on exchange creation.WHAT WE DO?With the lowest spread and swap against the currency you choose.Once you create your swap transaction, our algorithm finds the best available rate and swap to the currency you want.

comments.author: BF-Fi
comments.body: Quote from: unnamed0simple on July 13, 2022, 08:15:05 AMSubscription form does not exist.Go to our   Website ---> Scroll Down ----> Click on Subscription form

comments.author: Ammaa
comments.body: can i join with the Affiliate programme? Is it available for anyone?

comments.author: BF-Fi
comments.body: Quote from: Ammaa on July 31, 2022, 06:09:14 AMcan i join with the Affiliate programme? Is it available for anyone?Of course, you can join via this link --> https://changeangel.io/affiliate

comments.author: hirushaa
comments.body: from where is this project based on? and can we see your team with their LinkedIn profiles?

comments.author: BF-Fi
comments.body: Quote from: hirushaa on July 31, 2022, 06:28:51 AMfrom where is this project based on? and can we see your team with their LinkedIn profiles?Based on USA, But we haven't updated these info in our website for now, we will update it there as soon as possible..

comments.body: Quote from: BF-Fi on July 31, 2022, 06:30:26 AMQuote from: hirushaa on July 31, 2022, 06:28:51 AMfrom where is this project based on? and can we see your team with their LinkedIn profiles?Based on USA, But we haven't updated these info in our website for now, we will update it there as soon as possible.. and It's better if you can do announcements about your exchange via popular crypto currency medias.

comments.body: Quote from: hirushaa on July 31, 2022, 06:33:03 AMQuote from: BF-Fi on July 31, 2022, 06:30:26 AMQuote from: hirushaa on July 31, 2022, 06:28:51 AMfrom where is this project based on? and can we see your team with their LinkedIn profiles?Based on USA, But we haven't updated these info in our website for now, we will update it there as soon as possible.. and It's better if you can do announcements about your exchange via popular crypto currency medias. A greate idea, looking forward to make it happens

comments.author: gotabaya
comments.body: Do you have your own Token or  coin ? So if yes ,  is there ny ongoing ICO ?

comments.author: BF-Fi
comments.body: Quote from: gotabaya on August 14, 2022, 07:25:14 AMDo you have your own Token or  coin ? So if yes ,  is there ny ongoing ICO ? We don't have n ICO program, We re very happy to inform you that this is a self funded project .

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.created_time: August 14, 2022, 08:09:44 PMLast edit: May 14, 2023, 03:46:53 PM by JeromeTash
comments.body: You say your exchange is noncustodial yet I see nothing noncustodial about itFirst off, you need users to sign up before using your service. I have never seen noncustodial service that requires users to sign up on their platform

comments.author: reddhead99
comments.body: Will ReddCoin ever be listed again? It may not be very profitable for you, but I think it's hard to continue a good activity without the cooperation of exchange with a vision like yours.

comments.author: john1010
comments.body: There's a lot of good project that are launched this year, and like this project, when we see it, you can see lots of potential that are offers in this project, but the challenging part is, how this project will attract community and of course big investors. Anyway i just want to say good luck.

comments.author: TimeTeller
comments.body: Quote from: john1010 on August 15, 2022, 11:57:53 AMThere's a lot of good project that are launched this year, and like this project, when we see it, you can see lots of potential that are offers in this project, but the challenging part is, how this project will attract community and of course big investors. Anyway i just want to say good luck.Just wondering if some of the users in the forum have found their way to this exchange?It says on their site, they have been operating since 2019, so I guess this exchange is already generating their income.Anyway, would be good to see the list of those projects that this exchange has donated some of their income.This will give more inspiration to use this exchange if you know they are not only here for business but also doing some charitable acts.

comments.author: BF-Fi
comments.body: Quote from: TimeTeller on August 15, 2022, 05:49:17 PMQuote from: john1010 on August 15, 2022, 11:57:53 AMThere's a lot of good project that are launched this year, and like this project, when we see it, you can see lots of potential that are offers in this project, but the challenging part is, how this project will attract community and of course big investors. Anyway i just want to say good luck.Just wondering if some of the users in the forum have found their way to this exchange?It says on their site, they have been operating since 2019, so I guess this exchange is already generating their income.Anyway, would be good to see the list of those projects that this exchange has donated some of their income.This will give more inspiration to use this exchange if you know they are not only here for business but also doing some charitable acts.please reach out to DigiByte, Litecoin, Ravencoin communities or their foundations and ask.

comments.body: Quote from: john1010 on August 15, 2022, 11:57:53 AMThere's a lot of good project that are launched this year, and like this project, when we see it, you can see lots of potential that are offers in this project, but the challenging part is, how this project will attract community and of course big investors. Anyway i just want to say good luck.So then,its your responsibility to give them a green trust or red trust comment , i think it is checked by an administrator... so it will be a good point to figure it out to new members like me

comments.author: kurniawan05
comments.body: The exchange looks like a decentralized exchange but why do we have to sign up to use this exchange? Why not connect using metamask or truswallet to use this exchange?

comments.author: BF-Fi
comments.body: Quote from: kurniawan05 on September 01, 2022, 11:01:20 PMThe exchange looks like a decentralized exchange but why do we have to sign up to use this exchange? Why not connect using metamask or truswallet to use this exchange?Changeangel is not an Ethereum dex. Wallet connect will be available only if you have the changeangel non custodial decentralised wallet, when it is available, by the end of the year.

comments.author: Ammaa
comments.body: Quote from: BF-Fi on July 13, 2022, 03:33:18 AM                          Changeangel is non-custodial exchangeA quick and safe non-custodial way to buy and sell over 100 coinsHOW IT WORKS?Here are the 3 steps on exchange creation.WHAT WE DO?With the lowest spread and swap against the currency you choose.Once you create your swap transaction, our algorithm finds the best available rate and swap to the currency you want.Still there are very few people have been downloaded the app.. may be you need some more marketing campaigns in play store and several other exchnges
